translation.en: Now, this is how you make a bed…
the right way.
And this… [grunts]
Is how you make a bed…
the Lay Lay way.
-What's wrong with you? -What's wrong with you?
translation.ko: 너 왜 그래? 넌 왜 그래?

translation.en: Anyway, have you seen Marky yet?
Not since he found out you're an avatar that came out of my phone.
translation.ko: 네가 내 휴대폰에서 나온 아바타인 걸 알게 된 후로 못 봤어

translation.en: Girl, I've never seen someone scream so loud and run so fast.
translation.ko: 그렇게 크게 소리 지르고 초스피드로 달아나는 사람은 처음 봤어

translation.en: And I've seen your father around a cricket.
translation.ko: 아저씨가 귀뚜라미 보고 그러는 건 봤지만

translation.en: And that's after we explained everything to Marky.
translation.ko: 마키는 우리 설명을 다 듣고 그랬어

translation.en: Yeah. Now that he knows my secret, we got to make sure he's cool.
translation.ko: 이제 내 비밀을 알아 버렸으니 걔를 진정시켜야 해

translation.en: Otherwise, he's gonna tell your parents.
And they'll know we've been lying to them.
There's nothing my parents hate more than liars.
Maybe raisins and coleslaw, but liars are up there.
Hopefully he's not freaking out.
I'm still freaking out!
I can't believe I've been around Lay Lay this long
translation.ko: 그렇게 오랫동안 안 사이인데 이상한 걸 눈치 못 챘다니

translation.en: and never noticed anything strange about her.
translation.ko: 그렇게 오랫동안 안 사이인데 이상한 걸 눈치 못 챘다니 어이가 없어

translation.en: Or did I notice and you made me forget?
translation.ko: 아니면 눈치챘는데 네가 내 기억을 지웠어?

translation.en: Do you have mind-wipe powers? Stop wiping my mind.
translation.ko: 정신을 맑게 하는 능력이 있어? 내 정신엔 쓰지 마

translation.en: She didn't. You just didn't notice anything strange about her.
translation.ko: 안 그랬어, 그냥 네가 이상한 걸 눈치 못 챈 거야

translation.en: Because there's nothing strange to notice.
Besides, you're a 10-year-old who wears a sweater vest.
I wouldn't talk, little one.
Marky, this is a good thing.
When Lay Lay was in my phone, she was an avatar for my positive affirmation app.
translation.ko: 레이 레이는 내 휴대폰의 긍정 앱 아바타였어

translation.en: Yes. I'm really good at helping people become the best versions of themselves.
translation.ko: 난 사람들이 자신의 최고 버전이 되도록 돕는 걸 잘하지

translation.en: Look at me. Because of Lay Lay, I'm more outgoing, and I'm the president of my class now.
translation.ko: 날 봐, 덕분에 더 외향적이 됐고 반 대표까지 하잖아

translation.en: She even gave me the confidence to become an era-era DJ.
translation.ko: DJ가 될 수 있다는 자신감도 레이 레이가 심어 줬어

translation.en: Some people say I got it going in.
On? Out? Whatever. People are talking.
I'm talking about how, just 12 hours ago, I saw you turn invisible.
translation.ko: 12시간 전에 네가 투명 인간이 되는 걸 봤단 말이야

translation.en: Okay. Did it scare you?
Please. I'm done freaking out.
Okay.
-Boo! -Aah! I was wrong!
I'm still freaking out!
This is either their happy dance, or they stepped in some fire ants.
translation.ko: 해피 댄스를 추는 것이거나 불개미를 밟았기 때문이야

translation.en: Girls, we just got some of the best news of our careers.
translation.ko: 얘들아, 우리 일과 관련해서 굉장한 소식이 있어

translation.en: Oh, let me guess, Bun B sampled one of your songs, and now you're rich,
translation.ko: 맞혀 볼게요, 번 B가 두 분 곡을 샘플링한 덕분에 엄청 부자가 돼서

translation.en: so we can spend the rest of our lives on private jets and yachts.
translation.ko: 우린 이제 평생 전용 제트기랑 요트 타면서 노는 거예요!

translation.en: No, but thank you for making our good news less exciting.
translation.ko: 아니, 근데 진짜 소식을 살짝 김빠지게 해 줘서 고맙다

translation.en: We were named Advertising Songwriters of the Year
by the Cleveland Hall of Fame Music Awards.
You won a CHoFMA? That's how John Legend became John Legend.
translation.ko: '초프마' 상이요? 존 레전드가 그 상 받고 존 레전드 됐잖아요

translation.en: Before he won a CHoFMA, he was just John.
There's a fancy ceremony coming up, and anybody who's anybody in the biz attends.
translation.ko: 곧 멋진 시상식이 열릴 거야 업계 사람은 누구나 참석해

translation.en: Winning an award like this triples your business.
So maybe there will be a yacht.
Girl, ain't gonna be no yachts.
Look, can't you just be happy for us?
translation.ko: 그냥 좀 기뻐해 주면 안 돼?

translation.en: Bryce, tell them who we're asking to introduce us.
translation.ko: 브라이스, 누가 우리를 소개하는지 말해 줘

translation.en: -Our friend, hip-hop superstar-- -Iggy Azalea.
translation.ko: 우리 친구인 힙합 슈퍼스타… 이기 아잘레아!

translation.en: Really? You stole my thunder?
Mr. A, you know Iggy Azalea?
Oh, you're not as lame as Sadie says you are.
I never said lame. I said…
I love you, Daddy.
-Iggy is the perfect person to do it. -Yeah, we co-wrote a jingle with her
translation.ko: 이기만큼 적합한 사람이 없어 뜨기 전에 우리가 만든 시엠송을 불렀으니까 동료 관계지

translation.en: before she blew up. We're practically peers.
translation.ko: 뜨기 전에 우리가 만든 시엠송을 불렀으니까 동료 관계지

translation.en: Yeah, just like Mrs. A's workout buddy is Michelle Obama.
translation.ko: 아주머니의 운동 친구는 미셸 오바마이고 말이야

translation.en: [laughing] Right.
Michelle wishes she had this arm definition.
translation.ko: 미셸이 얼마나 이런 팔을 갖고 싶어 하는데 그래요

translation.en: Every year, the CHoFMA recipient gets to pick someone to perform at the ceremony.
translation.ko: 초프마 수상자는 시상식 공연자를 선택할 권한이 있어

translation.en: Oh, here's a crazy idea that isn't so crazy.
translation.ko: 엄청 기발하진 않은 기발한 아이디어가 있는데요

translation.en: What if Lay Lay and I perform?
Oh, girls, I'm sorry.
I think what the music awards are looking for is more of a big-name act.
translation.ko: 주최 측에선 이름 있는 사람을 원하는 것 같아

translation.en: What's bigger than someone with two names?
translation.ko: 그러면 저죠 이름이 두 번 반복되잖아요

translation.en: Come on, Mom and Dad, we want to perform in front of Iggy Azalea.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠 이기 아잘레아 앞에서 공연하고 싶어요

translation.en: And this is your big night. We want to be a part of it.
translation.ko: 두 분께 중요한 날이니까 우리도 동참하고 싶고요

translation.en: Please, Mrs. A.
I won't beg you, but I will make Sadie do it.
translation.ko: 저는 간청 안 해요 세이디한테 시킬래요

translation.en: Okay, but you girls got to bring your A game.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그 대신 최고를 보여줘야 한다

translation.en: Yes!
We get to perform in front of Iggy Azalea!
Sounds like it's gonna be a big night for all of us.
translation.ko: 우리 모두에게 중요한 밤이 될 것 같네

translation.en: Oh, what was that dance you all were doing when we walked out here?
translation.ko: 우리 여기 왔을 때 추고 계셨던 춤이 뭐죠?

translation.en: ♪ I'm Sadie's affirmation app ♪
♪ And so no matter what happens, I got her back ♪
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있어도 난 세이디 편

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause see my homey Sadie wished on a star ♪
♪ She said, "I wish you were real," now I'm as real as you are ♪
translation.ko: '네가 진짜였으면 좋겠어' 그래서 진짜 사람이 됐어

translation.en: -♪ And now who's coming out the app? ♪ -♪ That girl Lay Lay ♪
translation.ko: - 자, 누가 앱에서 나왔지? - 댓 걸 레이 레이 - 시간 정지는 누구 아바타 파워? - 댓 걸 레이 레이

translation.en: -♪ Who's avatar power is to freeze? ♪ -♪ That girl Lay Lay ♪
translation.ko: - 시간 정지는 누구 아바타 파워? - 댓 걸 레이 레이

translation.en: ♪ All day, all day, it's your girl ♪
♪ That girl, that girl, that girl, that girl Lay Lay ♪
translation.ko: 댓 걸 댓 걸 댓 걸 댓 걸 레이 레이 "댓 걸 레이 레이"

translation.en: Okay. I think I got all the freaking out out.
Do you want to hear about Lay Lay's other powers?
There's more? Can you fly? Shoot lasers out of your eyes?
translation.ko: 더 있어? 날 수 있어? 눈에서 레이저 발사해?

translation.en: Turn broccoli into brownies?
No. Lay Lay's powers are related to the phone.
When she holds her breath and disappears, it's like a phone going into rest mode.
translation.ko: 숨을 참을 때 사라지는 건 폰이 휴식 모드 되는 거랑 같아

translation.en: And have you ever hit pause on a video?
translation.ko: 그리고, 비디오 보다가 일시 정지 눌러 봤지?

translation.en: Whoa. How is that possible?
Anything's possible when you're this fabulous.
Okay. So I can't catch, but I can freeze time.
translation.ko: 뭐, 잡을 수는 없지만 시간을 정지시킬 순 있어

translation.en: And if there's anyone I don't want to freeze, I just have to think about them.
translation.ko: 정지 안 시키고 싶은 사람 있으면 그 사람을 생각하면 돼

translation.en: Wait, have you ever frozen me before and I didn't know it?
translation.ko: 그럼 나 몰래 날 정지시킨 적 있어?

translation.en: [as Marky] Wait. Have you ever frozen me before and I didn't know it?
translation.ko: '그럼 나 몰래 나를 정지시킨 적 있어?'

translation.en: [normally] Of course not, Marky.
I didn't think so. I'm way too smart for that.
translation.ko: 아니었을걸 난 그 정도로 멍청하지 않아

translation.en: What did Mom and Dad say when they learned about Lay Lay?
Uh, I'll never forget what they said. Right? What'd they say, Lay Lay?
translation.ko: 두 분 반응은 절대 못 잊지 뭐라고 했더라, 레이 레이?

translation.en: Uh, they said, "Wow,"
and--and, "Whoa," and then your mom--
Hey, kids.
Hey, Dad. How come you never told me Lay Lay is--
translation.ko: - 얘들아 - 아빠 - 왜 말 안 했어요? 레이 레이가… - 마키!

translation.en: Marky, Mr. A doesn't want to talk about me being an avatar.
translation.ko: - 왜 말 안 했어요? 레이 레이가… - 마키! 아저씬 내가 아바타인 사실을 말하기 싫어하셔

translation.en: Yeah. He's so over Lay Lay and her powers.
translation.ko: 맞아! 그거랑 레이 레이의 능력 얘기는 지겹대

translation.en: Wait a minute. You never told them.
translation.ko: 잠깐! 엄마, 아빠한텐 말 안 했지?

translation.en: I certainly don't not did.
You're doing that weird double-negative thing when you lie.
translation.ko: 누나는 거짓말할 때 그 이상한 이중 부정을 하더라

translation.en: I certainly am not not doing that.
translation.ko: 난 분명히 그거 안 하지 않고 있어

translation.en: Dang, Sadie, this is why I never play spades with you.
translation.ko: 세이디, 이래서 내가 너랑 우주 게임을 안 하는 거야

translation.en: You are the only other person besides us who knows the secret.
translation.ko: 이 비밀을 아는 사람은 우리 외엔 너뿐이야

translation.en: Well, there's also a goat who knows everything, but she ain't no snitch.
translation.ko: 염소 한 마리도 알아 근데 일러바치진 않지

translation.en: Wait. If I'm the only one that knows,
that means you two need me to keep this secret. And you know that means?
translation.ko: 비밀을 지켜 줘야겠네? 그게 무슨 뜻인지 알아?

translation.en: That we have a bond more sacred than a pinky promise?
translation.ko: 새끼손가락 약속보다 더 신성한 결의를 맺은 사이라고?

translation.en: No. It means you two work for me now,
translation.ko: 아니, 이제 너희 둘이 내 꼬붕이 돼야 한단 거지

translation.en: or I tell Mom and Dad everything.
translation.ko: 안 그러면 엄마, 아빠한테 다 말할 거야

translation.en: You wouldn't dare.
Who am I talking to? Of course he would dare.
Lay Lay, we have to do what he says.
translation.ko: 레이 레이 얘가 시키는 대로 해야 해

translation.en: How come I never told you Lay Lay was what, Marky?
translation.ko: 내가 뭘 말 안 했단 거야?

translation.en: That Lay Lay is such a good mime. Sadie too.
translation.ko: 레이 레이가 마임을 엄청 잘한다는 거요 세이디도요 상자에 갇힌 사람 해 봐

translation.en: Show him trapped-in-the-box, girls.
translation.ko: 세이디도요 상자에 갇힌 사람 해 봐

translation.en: Okay. Why don't you guys stay locked in that box and I'll just leave?
translation.ko: 그래, 너희는 계속 갇혀 있어 난 이만 나갈 테니까

translation.en: -Ooh, that was close. -Yeah. Good cover, Marky.
translation.ko: 큰일 날 뻔했다 그래, 잘했어, 마키 레이 레이 팀에 잘 들어왔어

translation.en: It's nice to have you on Team Lay Lay.
translation.ko: 그래, 잘했어, 마키 레이 레이 팀에 잘 들어왔어

translation.en: Oh, no. From now on, this is Team Marky,
and I need a fan and foot rub, stat.
translation.ko: 그리고 부채질이랑 발 마사지도 필요해, 당장

translation.en: Say what now?
Why would we ever do that? Mom? Dad?
translation.ko: - 우리가 왜 그딴 걸 해? - 엄마? 아빠?

translation.en: Oh, yeah. This is gonna work out just fine.
Marky's been wearing me out, Sadie.
He had me freeze time twice just so he could get a snack during his favorite TV show.
translation.ko: 좋아하는 프로 보며 간식 먹는다고 시간 정지를 두 번이나 시키잖아

translation.en: Just press pause, Marky.
I know. I made the snacks. But I snuck down here to work on our song.
translation.ko: 알아, 그 간식 내가 만들었잖아 노래 작업 하러 몰래 내려왔어

translation.en: Good, because we really need to rehearse for the CHoFMAs.
translation.ko: 잘했어, 초프마 시상식 공연 연습 많이 해야 하잖아

translation.en: It's your parents' big night, and Iggy Azalea is gonna be there.
translation.ko: 부모님의 중요한 날인데다 이기 아잘레아가 오니까

translation.en: We got to bring it.
Oh, it's been brung.
-[music playing] -Ready for this?
Come on.
Come on. You like that? You like that? All right, come on, come on.
translation.ko: 해 마음에 들어? 좋아, 같이 해 같이 찢어 버리자

translation.en: Break with me, girl. And break it with me, girl.
translation.ko: 마음에 들어? 좋아, 같이 해 같이 찢어 버리자 찢어, 같이 찢어, 나랑 같이 찢어

translation.en: Break it with me. Break it with me. Shimmy, shimmy, shimmy.
translation.ko: 찢어, 같이 찢어, 나랑 같이 찢어 헤이, 흔들흔들

translation.en: -[music ends] -Oh, no shimmy.
No shimmy?
I can't. [hiccups]
Oh, I've never heard you hiccup before.
You okay, Lay Lay, or was my dancing just that bad?
Marky has been nonstop with his demands. [hiccups]
translation.ko: 마키가 쉴 새도 없이 뭘 해달라잖아

translation.en: He had me use my powers a million times today,
translation.ko: 평소보다 능력을 백만 배는 더 썼단 말이야

translation.en: and your dancing is that bad.
If it isn't my favorite girls.
translation.ko: 누군가 했더니 내가 제일 좋아하는 누나들이네!

translation.en: I've got a new entrepreneurial endeavor that you two are going to love helping me with,
translation.ko: 새로운 사업을 구상했어 둘이 날 무척 도와주고 싶을 거야

translation.en: because I said so.
Marky, we've got to practice for our performance,
translation.ko: 마키, 우린 공연 연습을 해야 해

translation.en: and Lay Lay is tired from all your demands.
translation.ko: 레이 레이는 네 요구 들어주다 지쳤어

translation.en: Stop power-tripping on her powers.
I hear you, but I've got financial independence to achieve.
translation.ko: 이해는 하는데 난 재정적으로 독립해야 하거든

translation.en: That's why I invested in a new instant hair-removal cream called InstaShave.
translation.ko: 그래서 '인스타 셰이브'라는 새로운 즉석 제모 크림에 투자했지

translation.en: What do you know about hair removal?
The closest thing you have to a mustache is ketchup on your lip.
translation.ko: 콧수염이랑 가장 비슷한 건 입술에 묻은 케첩이면서

translation.en: I don't need it, but the A-listers at the CHoFMAs will.
translation.ko: 난 수염이 없지만 초프마 시상식의 유명인들은 있지

translation.en: And if the right celebrity gets ahold of InstaShave, my business will boom.
translation.ko: 적절한 셀럽 손에 제품이 들어가기만 하면 내 사업은 대박 나는 거야

translation.en: Uh-uh. I see where this is going.
You want us to use InstaShave on our heads!
translation.ko: 인스타 셰이브를 우리 머리에 쓰라는 거지?

translation.en: What? [hiccups] I'm not doing that. These buns are… [hiccups] Iconic.
translation.ko: 뭐? 난 안 해 이 머리 빵은 나의 상징이라고

translation.en: Calm down. All the celebrities get gift bags full of swag.
translation.ko: 진정해, 셀럽들은 선물이 가득 든 스왜그 가방을 받잖아

translation.en: You think I don't know what swag is? Look at me.
translation.ko: 스왜그가 뭔지 모를 것 같니? 나를 봐

translation.en: All I need you to do is sneak some samples of InstaShave into the CHoFMA swag bag
translation.ko: 두 사람이 해 줄 일은 초프마 스왜그 가방에 제품 샘플을 슬쩍 넣는 거야 셀럽들이 가져 가게

translation.en: so that every celebrity leaves with it.
translation.ko: 제품 샘플을 슬쩍 넣는 거야 셀럽들이 가져 가게

translation.en: What if we say… [hiccups] No?
I'll say… [hiccups] Mom, Dad!
Fine. Whatever you want, Marky.
Or I can take this lovely pillow and smack the snitch out of him.
translation.ko: 아니면 이 예쁜 베개로 저 녀석을 후려갈길 수도 있어!

translation.en: No, Lay Lay. Put the pillow down. Hey, hey, hey! No, no.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 레이 레이, 베개 내려놔 야! 안 돼, 하지 마

translation.en: -Hey, stop! -You want to do this?
translation.ko: 안 돼, 레이 레이, 베개 내려놔 야! 안 돼, 하지 마 - 어떻게 이럴 수가 있어? - 안 돼, 그만, 레이 레이 나빠

translation.en: -Let me do this! -No. No more. -Let me go. -Hey, bad Lay Lay.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 이럴 수가 있어? - 안 돼, 그만, 레이 레이 나빠

translation.en: Bad Lay Lay. Bad, bad, bad.
translation.ko: - 어떻게 이럴 수가 있어? - 안 돼, 그만, 레이 레이 나빠 안 돼, 그만 그만해, 레이 레이

translation.en: Honey, how are we supposed to know what Iggy Azalea's assistant looks like?
translation.ko: 여보, 이기 아잘레아의 비서가 누군지 어떻게 알아봐?

translation.en: They all look the same: computer-y, glasses,
translation.ko: 다 똑같이 생겼잖아 컴잘알 얼굴에 안경 끼고

translation.en: pale, and weak from too much screen time.
translation.ko: 화면을 너무 많이 봐서 창백하고 몸은 약골이지

translation.en: Hi. I'm Jasmine, the pale and weak assistant you're here to meet.
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 재스민이에요 여기서 보기로 한 창백한 약골이요

translation.en: You're Iggy Azalea's assistant?
-Yeah. -But you're so young.
Am I, or are you just really old?
-Listen, little girl-- -Uh, thank you.
Thank you for taking the time to meet with us.
translation.ko: 이렇게 시간 내 만나 줘서 고마워요

translation.en: So Iggy would love to give your presentation speech.
translation.ko: 이기가 여러분을 무척 소개하고 싶어 해요

translation.en: Yes!
I celebrated too soon, didn't I?
Little bit.
As her new assistant, I need to make sure
that she's associating with the right people.
Ms. Alexander, it's to my understanding that you're a bit of a…diva.
translation.ko: 알렉산더 부인, 제가 알기론 주인공 자리를 좀 밝히신다고요

translation.en: Excuse me?
Oh, no, you said the D word.
Iggy said you got into an argument with her the last time you worked together.
translation.ko: 이기한테 들었어요 예전의 협업 때 다툼이 있었다고요

translation.en: Oh, no, she's still hung up on that? I wouldn't call it an argument.
translation.ko: - 뭐야, 아직도 그걸로 꽁해요? - 내가 보기엔 다툼이 아니라…

translation.en: It's just she was wrong, and I was right.
translation.ko: - 뭐야, 아직도 그걸로 꽁해요? - 내가 보기엔 다툼이 아니라… 이기가 틀렸고 내가 맞았죠

translation.en: And apparently you told her that, a lot.
translation.ko: 그리고 보아하니 그 말을 이기한테 많이 했고요

translation.en: It was a jingle for Hooper's Hot Tubs, but it was so long ago,
translation.ko: '후퍼'의 '핫 터브' 시엠송이었죠 오래전 일이라 기억도 안 나는…

translation.en: -who can even remember-- -Okay.
translation.ko: '후퍼'의 '핫 터브' 시엠송이었죠 오래전 일이라 기억도 안 나는… 이기는 이걸 원했어요

translation.en: She wanted ♪ Ooh, my, my, buy a hot tub ♪
translation.ko: 이기는 이걸 원했어요 우, 세상에, 욕조를 사세요

translation.en: But I knew it should be ♪ My, my, ooh, buy a hot tub ♪
translation.ko: 근데 분명히 이거였죠 세상에, 우, 욕조를 사세요

translation.en: You heard it. I was right.
-Should I be talking to you? -I think that would be best.
The only way Iggy is willing to introduce you two
translation.ko: 이기가 두 분을 소개할 마음이 들게 하려면

translation.en: is if I get a video of her apologizing.
Okay. I understand.
Come on, baby. Say you're sorry.
Oh, that's not it. Iggy wants Trish to do an "I'm sorry" dance
translation.ko: 그거 말고요, 이기는 트리시가 '미안해' 춤을 춰서

translation.en: so she can share it with her millions of followers.
Oh, and you're gonna love the song.
translation.ko: 그 노래 맘에 드실 거예요 이거예요

translation.en: It goes ♪ Ooh, my, my, I'm sorry ♪
translation.ko: 그 노래 맘에 드실 거예요 이거예요 우, 세상에, 미안해

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry. I'm sorry that you wasted your breath singing that nonsense.
translation.ko: 미안하네요, 그런 쓰레기 같은 노래에 숨을 허비하게 해서요

translation.en: Honey, honey, having Iggy Azalea introduce us would be a huge deal.
translation.ko: 여보, 이기 아잘레아가 소개하면 엄청난 파급 효과가 생길 거야

translation.en: Just… just apologize.
translation.ko: 여보, 이기 아잘레아가 소개하면 엄청난 파급 효과가 생길 거야 그냥 사과해

translation.en: -Who cares now? -[sighs] No.
translation.ko: 아무도 신경 안 써 안 해

translation.en: Please, baby, baby, please.
No, baby, baby, no.
You have 24 hours to change your mind. I'll be here same time tomorrow.
translation.ko: 24시간 드릴 테니 결정하세요 내일 이 시간에 여기서 봐요

translation.en: Oh, right. I ordered lunch, but now I'm not hungry.
translation.ko: 맞다, 점심을 주문했네요 근데 배가 안 고픈데 어쩌죠?

translation.en: Iggy would want you to pay for it.
Okay, bye.
What even is InstaShave?
Sweet James Brown, Marky is going to need
translation.ko: 스위트 제임스 브라운 이 끈적한 걸 팔려면 셀럽의 추천 가지곤 안 될 거야

translation.en: more than a celebrity endorsement to sell this goop.
translation.ko: 이 끈적한 걸 팔려면 셀럽의 추천 가지곤 안 될 거야

translation.en: [gags] Oh, yeah. That stuff definitely works
because it just burned out all my nose hairs.
Okay. These are custom labels with my adorable smile on them.
translation.ko: 나의 사랑스러운 미소가 들어간 맞춤 라벨도 가져왔어

translation.en: No one could say no to this face.
translation.ko: 이 얼굴을 보고 거절할 사람은 아무도 없지

translation.en: You want us to put those labels on every single one of these containers?
Oh, not just these. There's 12 more boxes.
translation.ko: 이게 다가 아니야 상자가 12개 더 있어

translation.en: So you girls had better get a move on. Toodles.
translation.ko: 그러니까 서두르는 게 좋을걸? 난 간다!

translation.en: [sighs] Let's get to work.
As long as we're under Marky's thumb, we're never gonna get a chance to rehearse for the CHoFMAs,
translation.ko: 마키의 손아귀에 있는 한 우린 공연 연습을 절대 못 해

translation.en: and we can't let my parents down.
You're right. We're gonna be here all night.
translation.ko: 맞아, 밤새 이거 하다 아침 맞아

translation.en: both: Bars.
Wait, I know. We can multitask.
Let's rehearse our performance while we finish Marky's work.
translation.ko: 마키가 시킨 일을 하면서 공연 연습도 하는 거야

translation.en: Come on, girl.
♪ Rip and dip that hip ♪
Okay.
♪ Go, Lay Lay, go, Lay Lay ♪
translation.ko: 고, 레이 레이, 고 레이 레이

translation.en: ♪ Go, Sadie, do the Say Say ♪
♪ Hey ♪
-♪ Whoa ♪ -Clap. -Do a hip. -Oh! Get into it!
translation.ko: - 왓, 왓, 손뼉! - 손뼉, 엉덩이 돌려, 할 수 있어?

translation.en: Is this fun and frolicking I see?
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no!
I want less "Happy Feet" and more "Hard Knock Life."
You know what? Forget this.
I'm going upstairs to get me a drink and kick my feet up.
translation.ko: 난 위층에 올라가서 음료수 한잔하고 다리 뻗고 쉴래

translation.en: -Do I need to tell my parents your secret? -I wish you would.
translation.ko: - 네 비밀을 부모님한테 말해? - 그랬으면 좋겠다!

translation.en: -[buzzing] -Oh, I feel weird. Something's happening.
translation.ko: 기분이 이상해 무슨 일이 일어나고 있어

translation.en: Wow. She's moving with super speed.
Well, that's a new one.
Whoa. What was that? Did I just--
Zip around the room like Usain Bolt strapped to a rocket ship? Yeah. Yeah, you did.
translation.ko: 로켓선에 묶인 우사인 볼트처럼 방안을 쌩쌩 달렸냐고? 응, 그랬어

translation.en: You just found a new avatar power.
It's like speeding up a video on your phone.
translation.ko: 휴대폰의 영상 속도를 높이는 것과 같아

translation.en: Which is perfect, because we have so many more containers to label.
translation.ko: 완전 좋네, 우리 아직 라벨 붙일 통이 엄청 남았거든

translation.en: Wait, did I say we? Because I meant y'all.
Well, I guess this will give us more time to rehearse, since…
[hiccups] I can get this done quicker.
translation.ko: 내가 이걸 빨리 끝낼 수 있으니까

translation.en: Yeah. Maybe you're right.
♪ Let's go, Lay Lay, clap, clap ♪
Super speed, invisibility, freezing time?
With her avatar powers and my business genius,
translation.ko: 레이 레이의 능력과 나의 천재적인 사업 수완이라면

translation.en: we're gonna take over the world.
Thank you so much for doing this. It's just a silly apology video,
translation.ko: 해 줘서 고마워 그냥 유치한 사과 영상일 뿐이야

translation.en: and then tonight we'll be introduced
translation.ko: 덕분에 클리블랜드 명예의 전당 음악 시상식에서 소개받잖아

translation.en: at the Cleveland Hall of Fame Music Awards by Iggy Azalea.
translation.ko: 덕분에 클리블랜드 명예의 전당 음악 시상식에서 소개받잖아 이기 아잘레아한테!

translation.en: Who was wrong.
[sighs] Yeah. See, I know you were right, and you know you were right.
translation.ko: 그래, 난 당신이 옳았단 거 알아 당신도 알고, 그러니까…

translation.en: So what's it matter if her millions of followers think you were wrong?
translation.ko: 그래, 난 당신이 옳았단 거 알아 당신도 알고, 그러니까… 그쪽 팔로워 몇백만 명이 틀렸다 한들 무슨 상관이야?

translation.en: I'm gonna need one more.
translation.ko: 난 한 명이 더 필요할 거야

translation.en: -Please, baby, baby, please. -[laughs]
Ew, you're somebody's parents.
-Have you made your decision? -I have.
I'm doing this for you.
-For us. -Whatever.
Hit record, little girl.
♪ Ooh, my, my, I'm sorry ♪
♪ Ooh, my, my, I was wrong ♪
♪ Ooh, my, my, your way was better ♪
♪ This is my apology song ♪
Ooh, my, my.
We're going to break the Internet.
-And Iggy's gonna introduce us tonight? -You know it.
Okay, bye.
Thank you so much for doing this for us. I'm sorry you had to go through all this.
translation.ko: 우릴 위해서 해 줘서 고마워 이런 일 겪게 해서 미안해

translation.en: Oh, you can apologize better than that.
-What do you mean? -Uh-huh.
-No. -Ready?
-No, seriously-- -Ready, five, six, seven, eight.
♪ Ooh, my, my, I'm sorry ♪ ♪ Ooh, my, my, I was wrong ♪
translation.ko: 우, 세상에, 미안해 우, 세상에, 내가 틀렸어

translation.en: -Yeah. -♪ Ooh, my, my, your way was better ♪
translation.ko: 좋았어! - 우, 세상에, 네 방식이 나았어 - 팔 들어!

translation.en: -♪ This is my apology song ♪ -Break it down.
Babe, I forgot to press record.
translation.ko: 자기야, 녹화 버튼 누르는 걸 깜박했네

translation.en: Yeah. One more.
Five, six, seven, eight.
♪ Ooh, my, my, I'm sorry ♪
♪ Ooh, my, my, I was wrong ♪
♪ Ooh, my, my ♪
translation.ko: - 돌아 - 우, 세상에, 네 방식이 나았어

translation.en: I moved so fast, my brain got jiggled, and I do not like jiggly brain.
translation.ko: 너무 빨리 움직이니까 뇌가 흔들려 뇌 흔들리는 거 싫어

translation.en: Good job. The first phase of Operation Marky Gets Rich is complete.
Whoa. Lay Lay, you're hiccupping again.
-Are you okay? -Oh, yeah, I just… [hiccups]
translation.ko: 레이 레이, 또 딸꾹질하네 괜찮아? 응, 조금만 있으면 돼

translation.en: Need a minute.
Hey, kids. We got something to tell ya!
We just booked Iggy Azalea.
all: Bars.
Good job, Mom.
You're not as lame as Sadie says you are.
I never said that. I said--
I love you, Mommy.
Our 15 minutes of fame just turned into 20.
-Why are we running? -I'm too excited to walk!
translation.ko: 당신 왜 뛰어? - 너무 신나서 못 걸어! - 알았어!

translation.en: -Okay.
Your parents' night is gonna be so amazing.
translation.ko: 정말 근사한 부모님의 밤이 될 것 같아

translation.en: It's like a dream come true.
Speaking of dreams, let's talk about my dreams--
translation.ko: 꿈 하니 생각났는데 내 꿈 얘기를 해 보자

translation.en: money!
Lay Lay, you're going to use your super-speed powers
translation.ko: 초스피드 능력을 이용해서 샘플을 선물 가방에 넣어

translation.en: to get my samples into every gift bag, including Iggy's.
translation.ko: 초스피드 능력을 이용해서 샘플을 선물 가방에 넣어 이기의 가방에도

translation.en: You're gonna make us work more?
You're killing me, Marky.
I can't perform after filling up all those bags with super speed.
translation.ko: 초스피드로 그 일을 하고 나면 공연을 못 해

translation.en: I'm the queen of extra, but that is too extra.
translation.ko: 과한 걸 환영하는 나지만 그건 너무 과해

translation.en: Oh, I don't feel good.
-What are you doing? -Lay Lay Lay.
translation.ko: - 뭐 하는 거야? - 레이 레이 레이

translation.en: Lay Lay Lay Lay Lay Lay!
-Why do you keep saying your name? -Lay Lay Lay Lay Lay Lay.
translation.ko: - 왜 이름을 자꾸 말해? - 레이 레이

translation.en: Uh-oh. "Lay Lay" is all she can say. This isn't good.
translation.ko: 이런, '레이 레이'밖에 못 하네 이거 좋지 않아

translation.en: Lay Lay Lay Lay. Lay Lay.
What is wrong with her, Sadie?
You had her doing too much. Marky, you broke Lay Lay.
translation.ko: 네가 일을 너무 많이 시켰잖아 너 때문에 레이 레이가 망가졌어!

translation.en: Fashion is very, very, very, very important to me. It is a way that I keep my confidence up.
translation.ko: 패션은 제게 무척 중요해요 자신감을 유지하는 방법이죠

translation.en: I like to be done up for sure. But, like, if you see me in a grocery store, airport,
translation.ko: 차려입는 걸 좋아하지만 슈퍼나 공항에서 절 보시면

translation.en: joggers, hoodies,
but you know, I got some cute stuff in there.
So it's really just my comfort. I feel comfortable when I wear clothes like that.
translation.ko: 그러면 편안해지죠 그렇게 입는 게 편해요

translation.en: We're gonna go with that.
I want to pick it out. [laughs]
-Let's go red. -Red?
I have to wear something that makes me happy.
And that's life with That Girl Lay Lay.
translation.ko: 그게 '댓 걸 레이 레이'와 함께하는 삶이죠
